_meta.description: NCL stateroom type definitions by ship class with dimensions and features
_meta.notes: NCL uses distinctive naming: The Haven (suite complex), Studios (solo cabins), Spa categories

_ncl_category_codes.description: NCL uses letter-based category codes. Common prefixes:

stateroom_types.description: Comfortable interior stateroom with two lower beds convertible to queen, sitting area, full bathroom.
Solo traveler cabin with access to Studio Lounge. Full-size bed, private bathroom, modern design.
Oceanview cabin with porthole window, two lower beds convertible to queen.
Oceanview with large picture window for natural light and ocean views.
Private balcony stateroom with floor-to-ceiling glass doors, outdoor seating.
Enhanced balcony with suite-level amenities, priority embarkation, premium bathrobes.
Penthouse with expansive aft-facing balcony offering wake views, separate living area.
Suite with large balcony, premium bathroom amenities, concierge service.
The Haven suite with exclusive access to Haven courtyard, sundeck, restaurant, and concierge.

stateroom_types.marketing_name: The Haven Premier Owner's Suite with Large Balcony
stateroom_types.description: Premier Haven suite with separate living and dining, butler service, expansive balcony.

stateroom_types.marketing_name: The Haven Deluxe Owner's Suite with Large Balcony
stateroom_types.description: Top Haven suite with multiple bedrooms, whirlpool tub, expansive outdoor space, 24/7 butler.

meta.notes: Prima Plus design with additional venues; similar cabin types to Prima Class
